participant_1.background:
I am most proud of my ability to take care of myself and Gila, even though I grew up without parents.
I love to see my son's face light up when he sees his new toys in his nursery.
I am grateful to my parents for raising me with a good sense of financial responsibility.
I am worried about my future after high school, but my pet koi, Spot, always cheers me up.
i love to laugh.

participant_2.background:
I have a secret diary that I keep hidden in my room.
I wonder if my co worker likes me back.
I can't stand pizza, but my mom loves it.
I'm proud of my ability to stay calm under pressure.
i live on the third floor in an apartment.

content.text: Hi! I’m Gila, nice to meet you.
Hi Gila, nice to meet you too. I’m participant_2.  What do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my son and my pet koi. I also like to laugh.
Oh, that’s cool. I like to write in my secret diary and hang out with my co worker.
I love to laugh too! What are your favorite things to write about in your diary?
I write about my day and my co worker. I’m worried if she likes me back.
Oh, that sounds like fun. I’m sure she does like you back!
I hope so. I’m always worried about what she thinks of me.
Well, you seem like a great person, so I’m sure she does like you.
Thanks, Gila. That makes me feel better.
You’re welcome! So, what do you do for work?
I’m a teacher at a local elementary school. I love my job, but it can be stressful at times.
That’s great! I’m glad you love your job. I’m still in high school, so I’m not sure what I want to do with my life yet.
Oh, that’s exciting! You have your whole life ahead of you.
I know, it’s kind of scary, but also exciting.
It is, but it’s also a lot of fun.
I guess you’re right.
Well, I’m glad I met you, Gila.
Me too, it was nice talking to you.
I hope we can talk again soon.
Me too!
